ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Speaking of dragons...
ygData.msgSnippet: Grats on the Drum Sylly :) ... Ro-kenn Swiftsong - Karana server EQ Bard Song Analysis http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
ygData.messageBody:
Grats on the Drum Sylly :)

-------------------------------------------------
Ro-kenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 8:12 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Speaking of dragons...
>
>
> Last night we went for Lord Nagafen. Success! We got a book
> for our Palidan, Druid stick - Ally, Selo's Drums - Sylly,
> Scourge Hammer - Arif, GPK - not sure, Fire Emerald Ring -
> Ataras. Also, Crown of King Tranix, Mith Arms, Mask. Pretty
> nice haul for a change. We suffered 4 deaths on Nag and the
> fight was fun. He got out on to the bridge and fell off into
> the lava - ugh! We backed off quickly and he clambered out
> and fought on the far side of the bridge until he died.
>
> I am pretty excited with Selos drums and will be giving them
> a good workout. Looks like PoF tonight - going to be a lot
> of hair standing on end and begining chanters I suspect <eg>.
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> <The Pantheon>
> Bardette of 50 songs
> ... somewhere on Innoruuk
> http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly
>
>
>
>
>
